content.rendered:
#1 Selling Blog, Magazine and News Theme of All Time

View All Prebuilt Websites
Buy Newspaper theme

115,000+ dedicated customers trust us with their projects

You should too!

All Pre-built Websites are Included. Free Lifetime Updates. Outstanding Support

Newspaper 11 brings you more handcrafted options ready to help you create exquisite projects. Take a look at the full features list to find out what makes Newspaper the most complete blog, news, and magazine WordPress theme!

Yes! Let's get started

Introducing Newspaper's next generation

Theme Features

What makes 115,000 customers love Newspaper? We've made web design easy! Access the tagDiv Cloud Library, a massive collection of WordPress elements, templates & layouts to significantly reduce your development time. Over 1,000+ premium layouts are ready for you to use. Import what you like and customize everything on the frontend!

Access the Cloud Library

Astonishing Post Styles

Find the perfect form to tell your stories! We know one design will not work for every story, so we created over 90 unique post templates to give you the complete toolkit to write, publish, and broadcast. Choose the right one and customize it to perfection. Or just create your own. Newspaper 11 is everything you need!

See all the post templates

Engaging Category Templates

Dozens of fully customizable, professionally designed templates are waiting for you in the tagDiv Cloud Library. Use them across your website or just the one you love in a specific category page. With the Newspaper Theme your possibilities are endless!

Get inspired by our designs

Easy One-Click Install

Newspaper comes with an extremely simple installation engine. Load a pre-built website in a heartbeat and easily customize it to make it pixel perfect. Newspaper WordPress Theme powers up your inspiration with dozens of specialized designs and hundreds of one-click elements & layouts. Start now!

Buy Newspaper Now

Flexible WooCommerce Shortcodes

Newspaper theme brings you new superpowers for WooCommerce with over 27 new drag and drop elements for online stores. Selling online with your eCommerce website has never been faster, easier, and more scalable!

Explore the new elements

New technology for awesome websites

Building your Blog, News, Magazine or any other website has never been easier. Design your project quickly without touching a single line of code. All the features you need are already packed in a powerful WordPress theme. Experience the art of publishing with Newspaper!

For beginners & professionals alike

Over 115,000+ happy customers trust Newspaper Theme with their blog, news, magazine and business projects. You should, too!

See More details

Build everything on the frontend

All your ideas are ready to become reality. Drag and drop any element to create your design right on the frontend. No coding skills required!

Watch the film

Modern and trendsetting designs

Choose the perfect out-of-the-box theme for your every project. Newspaper brings you 100+ full website designs ready to be customized!

See More details

Header Builder

Easily create perfect headers for branding. Enjoy the flexibility of using perfect headers for different pages and devices. Change the design, add and remove elements, logos, menus. Take full control over your headers with Newspaper Theme!

Show me more

Footer Manager

This innovative system helps you create and customize each footer to the smallest detail and assign it to the desired page or article with a single click. Dozens of wonderful footer layouts are waiting for you in the Cloud Library. Choose, import, assign!

Discover more

Your Complete Toolkit for Web Design

tagDiv Composer

Discover a spectacular page builder created specially for you. tagDiv Composer page builder gives you all the tools you need to create, design, and shape up your Blog, News, Magazine, and Business website in virtually no time!

Buy Newspaper

Pre-built Pages

Transform your ‘About us’ and ‘Contact’ pages from dull to highly engaging sections on your website in a blink of the eyes. Dozens of presentation page layouts are available in the tagDiv Cloud Library. Choose the one you like and import the template with a single click. Yes! It's that easy!

Show me more

Landing Page Elements

For the first time ever on a WordPress magazine theme, you can easily build spectacular landing pages. Control the width & height on sections, content position, resize columns, adjust padding & margins, and more. All the multipurpose capabilities are now packed in the Newspaper Theme!

Watch the film

Visually stunning content lockers

With Newspaper Theme and tagDiv Opt-In Builder, you can easily transform your website traffic into subscribers, leads, and sales. The Newspaper theme brings you the capabilities to lock your content on articles and grow your email list.

Explore the new Leads shortcode and the filtering options that allows you to display the content on a specific element by combining existing filters with the "Exclusive" one. Discover the true capabilities of your website!

Get inspired. See Layouts

You are in good company!

Tens of thousands of people around the world have already created successful projects with Newspaper Theme.

Newspaper is one of the top themes currently available on WordPress, and I would have no hesitation in recommending it.

Wesley Dunn

Costas Online

Newspaper is a complete out-of-the-box WordPress theme, and also gives you the ability to fine-tune your website if you need it.

Maikel van Wijk

Hip&Hot

I've had a great experience with the theme. It has made my passion as a travel blogger come true with ease. Thanks!

Tenaya Taylor

Cultured Black Pearl

Your website is perfect on any device

Developed for Performance

Core Web Vitals Ready for Blazing Fast Websites

NewspaperTheme is ready to meet the Core Web Vitals and give your website a ranking boost.

Performance

Accessibility

Best Practices

SEO

Google AMP ready

Load Content 5x Faster! Newspaper theme loads only the essential content to create a great experience for your audience. The Accelerated Mobile Pages support is easy to set up as we tailored it to perfectly integrate with the all the features you love in Newspaper theme.

Discover Features

Blazing fast websites

Make your website load faster then ever! Newspaper Theme is now smaller, lighter and more efficient then most themes out there. Coded to load only what you use, with Newspaper WordPress Theme your website is optimized out-of-the-box.

Choose the performance and blazing-fast loading speed with a premium WordPress theme built for your success!

Show me more

Delightful Mobile Design

Stop trying to cram a desktop design into a mobile screen. With the Newspaper theme, everything fits perfectly on the small screen devices out-of-the-box, right from the start!

Newspaper is the first theme that automatically adjusts pages and content to create an extraordinary small screen user experience. Try it now!

Watch the film

SEO Ready

Rank higher on search engines! SEO is one of our top priorities and you can expect high SEO performance while using Newspaper Theme.

  • Built using the recommended coding standards
  • Smoothly integrates with the Yoast SEO plugin
  • Support for Google Structured Data and Schema Markup
  • Makes your pages SEO optimized out of the box

Top notch support

Facing an issue or have you got questions and need answers? Our expert team is here to help you create a successful project.

Community

Access a community where you can share your ideas with passionate people.

Join now

Documentation

Explore Newspaper theme's excellent videos, tutorials and presentation page.

Read more

Video tutorials

Newspaper main functionality explained in comprehensive video tutorials

Watch videos

Email us

Want to ask a question or just say Hi? You can reach us via email.

Join now

Keep in mind, our updates are FREE for our clients. Enjoy!

Not a customer yet? Start today, and you'll understand why so many awesome people love Newspaper Theme.

Buy Newspaper

5 Shapes for Flex Block

Flex Block is the most versatile element we’ve created for you to customize it in detail while displaying articles without constraints. Designed as a modular template, it’s the perfect solution for building fast and great looking projects.

Inspire your visitors by displaying the content from a category on a single post in a meaningful way. Filter it by awesome criteria as “Most Commented,” “Last Updated Content,” “Popular (last seven days),” “Highest Rated,” and more! Easily combine your content to stun your audience. It’s simple and versatile, just as you requested!

Show me more

Automatic updates ON

Updating your theme has never been so easy. With Newspaper Theme, you can install the newest version with a single click, directly from the Theme Panel. The system downloads the latest release from the tagDiv servers and automatically updates the theme’ files and the native plugins.

The Newspaper theme also creates a backup for the Theme Panel settings every time you click the Save button so that you can upgrade or downgrade your WordPress Theme. This way, you can focus on creating amazing content.

Discover automatic updates

Video powered websites

Easily create a great user experience for your users with Newspaper Theme using videos on your website

  • Build beautiful video playlists in a blink on an eye.
  • Highlight your video content in an engaging Modal Video Popup with Ads. Your audience can now watch your vlogs or article videos just by clicking on the featured video thumbnail. These videos run straight from the page.
  • All the videos from YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, or Self-Hosted URLs display the Video Duration Time.

Grab your audience’s attention with stunning content and keep them engaged on your website. It’s so easy!

Explore these features

Engaging infinite loading on articles

Give your visitors an excellent reason to stay longer on your website. When they read an article, the next one is ready to catch their attention. The auto-loading feature allows you to choose which content to be loaded next. Use older or newer posts, or even posts from the same category and provide great user experiences on your site.

Get Newspaper Now

Monetize your website

Generating revenue on your website is easier than ever. Newspaper theme brings you an intelligent Ad System recommended for both AdSense and banner ads! Create you ad spots where you need them. Discover the power of the most intelligent ad system!

Watch the film

Discover the new blending touch

Say hello to the new you - the skillful web designer. With Newspaper Theme you can add magic to your images without reaching to a picture editing software like Photoshop. Astounding image effects and blend modes are now available on tagDiv Composer blocks to help you get the most daring visual impact with your pages.

All the videos from YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, or Self-Hosted URLs display the Video Duration Time. Grab your audience’s attention with stunning content and keep them engaged on your website. It’s so easy!

Watch the film

Featuring Content Creators

Over 50 stunning Author Page Templates ready to use with a single click are waiting for you in the tagDiv Cloud Library. You can now quickly create eye-catching presentation pages for all your authors. Highlight your content creators' features by customizing each page using the power of the tagDiv Composer!

See templates

Exclusively from tagDiv

Premium Widgets

Carefully handcrafted widgets deliver top of the line performance to make your website more attractive than ever

tagDiv Custom Gallery

tagDiv's gallery is more than just a photo slider! With a unique design and integrated lightbox feature, this gallery is the perfect solution for any image collection. It can accommodate different aspect ratios and each image displays a description, and the copyright information.

See Demo

tagDiv Video Playlist

Add dynamism and visual enhancements to your website and bring more traffic! Newspaper is designed to display your enagaging videos in a playlist with autoplay support. Creating a video list has never been easier!

See demo

Weather Widget

Bring the beautiful weather to your website using our flashy weather widget! Everyone knows that the weather cannot be controlled, but as soon as it's possible, we will add this option to the widget 😉

Watch the film

Social Counter Widget

Display your social network activity and get ready to go viral! The widget design is now flexible, allowing you to try out each layout and choose the one that fits your website best!

Watch the film

Instagram Widget

All your wonderful images from Instagram have a new home. Bring powerful emotions and memorable moments into your website with Newspaper Theme. Use it on footer, sidebar, or anywhere in your site and delight your visitors!

Newsletter Widget

Keep your visitors engaged with the new content on your site. tagDiv Newsletter plugin comes with 8 elegant styles to help you reach out to your audience, and it’s integrated with the MailChimp, MailerLite, and the FeedBurner RSS feed provider.

Get Free Premium Widgets

Seamless Compatibility

Newspaper Theme loves to integrate with friends

Featured & appreciated by

Industry Critics

Awarded

By the best web designers

DISCOVER THE ART OF PUBLISHING WITH NEWSPAPER 11

Create your exquisite projects with Newspaper Theme - the most complete WordPress Theme for business, blog, news, magazine, and creative websites!

Start now
